message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm and believe in the value of the item. However, I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $100?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell the product at $100, as it's worth more to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value you'll get from the product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to compromise, I still feel that $100 would be a fair price for both of us. I hope we can come to an agreement closer to my budget.
